net.viktorc.detroid.framework.engine

Class MoveStringUtils

  • Object
    • MoveStringUtils

  • public class MoveStringUtils
extends Object
    A utility class for parsing move strings and converting move objects into move strings.
    Author:
    Viktor

    • Method Detail

      • parsePACN

        public static Move parsePACN(Position pos,
                             String pacn)
                      throws ChessParseException
        Parses a move string in PACN format.
        Parameters:
        pos - A position in which the move defined by the move string is legal.
        pacn - The move string to parse.
        Returns:
        The move object.
        Throws:
        ChessParseException - If the move string is in an illegal format.

      • parseSAN

        public static Move parseSAN(Position pos,
                            String san)
                     throws ChessParseException,
                            NullPointerException
        Parses a move string in SAN format.
        Parameters:
        pos - A position in which the move defined by the move string is legal.
        san - The move string to parse.
        Returns:
        The move object.
        Throws:
        ChessParseException - If the move string is in an illegal format.
        NullPointerException

      • toSAN

        public static String toSAN(Position pos,
                           Move move)
        It creates a move string in SAN format.
        Parameters:
        pos - A position in which the move defined by the move string is legal.
        move - The move to convert to a move string.
        Returns:
        The move string.
